sitha sanwara kara ganima, alpechcha jiwithayak gatha kirime watinakama, yahapath jiwithayak gatha karana aakaraya pilibandawa agana karunu rasakma â€œdhammapadayaâ€ thulin heli karayi.chayarupaya - lakshanâ€œdhamma padayaâ€ bauddhayange ath pothak washayen da salakayi. 1817 â€“ 1818 wellasse karallata nayakathwaya dun wira kappetipola nilamethumada thama mara damimata mohothakata pera thama langa thabagena siti â€œdhammapadayaâ€ potha eliyata gena in gathawak kiya kaduwata gela thabu ayuru api asa aththemu.swamin wahanse dharma deshanawak kirimata pera dhammapadaye gathawak idiripath kota ee anuwa dharma deshanawa karanu labathi.
